about_the_game:
Dominate the Goal Zone: Outlast your rivals and seize control to score. It’s not about kills—it’s about relentless control.

Engage in electrifying 1v1 duels, coordinate devastating team assaults, or unleash chaos in massive multi-team brawls! Every round is a wild, skill-testing party you won't want to miss. Easy to pick up, impossible to put down—this is a party game from another dimension!

Master the Hammer: Hurl it, teleport to it, and outsmart your opponents with pinpoint precision and cunning tactics.

8-Player Chaos – Battle it out in fast-paced multiplayer matches with up to 8 players online.

Blast into the Zone: Team up with friends (online or couch co-op) and brawl your way to freedom through the arcade portal. Battle across vibrant, neon-drenched stages where every punch, jump, and power-up bends the rules of reality. Holding the zone is the key to survival.

A World of Secrets – Beneath the clean and simple surface lies eerie, hidden lore—uncover glimpses of the unknown as you play.

Features ITZ:

  • Up to 8 PLAYERS

  • Your Squad, Your Rules: Play 1v1, 4v4, 1v7, or any combination you can imagine.

  • Couch/Local and Online Multiplayer

  • Cross-platform

  • 16 interactive, absurd arenas

  • Pick from 12 messed-up Outcasts trapped in the Zone. What could possibly go wrong? (Everything.)

  • Steam Achievements

  • Brutal Mayhem Guaranteed

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: AMD Zen 2
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RDNA 2
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Into the Zone – Arcade Escape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Control the zone and seize your freedom! A party brawl from another dimension! This fast-paced, quirky platform fighter blends arcade nostalgia with absurd, chaotic action. Battle it out with friends locally or online in explosive, action-packed matches where holding the zone is the key to survival.
